tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Words fall short honestly, I have the deepest admiration for a doctor like Dr. Nivedita Jha, we had the toughest 1st month changing 3 doctors in our pregnancy till we stumbled upon the lighthouse. 

I can never thank Dr. enough for the gift she helped bring to this world for us, our baby. 

She is absolutely clear in what she wants for her patient and in the best interest of the child and mother always. The only regret we have is not knowing her from before.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Social Obstetrics and Gynecologist,
review: *** ******** ** *** ** *** ****** ************ ** ********** *hreatened by one of the renowned physician in Bangalore for high risk pregnancy, we had to rush to Dr. Nivedita as recommended in social media and ever since we have never looked back. It was an wonderful journey for my wife and me throughout entire pregnency period. She is very compassionate, caring and treat individual case personally. She has utmost sense of emergency and available any time over phone in emergency situations. My wife had to deliver baby at midnight following an emergency labor pain, and doctor was availble for the surgery during that critical situation. We would like to thank Dr. Nivedita for her sincere effort and guiding us mentally, physically as friend philosopher and guide. More than a doctor, she is a great human being which is most important trait for a physician. We wish her all the best for future endeavors and would highly recommend Dr. Nivedita for any  gynecological issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I would strongly suggest dr Nivedita who's looking for the best gynecologist,  she's very friendly and tries to understand our problem and suggest medication only if required.she guided and stood by me throughout pregnancy .
Also she is approachable be it on watsapp or calls which most of the doctors fail
She gave me the confidence throughout, now I'm blessed wid healthy baby boy.

Thank u doctor for such a guidance and cooperation
reply_text: Thanks so much gamya..these words mean a lot!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor's way to handle emotional state of a pregnant woman is great. She keeps the expectation to the point and is very clear towards the problem as well as solution. We had a smooth period of 9 month with small hiccups and doctor was really supportive. Really lucky to consult her from early stage of pregnancy. Everything went in the way we wanted.

review: Dr. Nivedita is very friendly and showed eagerness to understand my issue by patiently listening and asking relevant questions for further investigation. I had been suffering from menstrual disorder for a decade(prior to meeting Dr. Nivedita). She explained the diagnosis and the required treatment very clearly. I appreciate the fact that she sets very realistic expectations and is ready to clarify any doubts that the patient has. I'm seeing tremendous improvement in my health condition, all thanks to the doctor's treatment and positive attitude.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the modest doctor I have seen,she listened all my issues and gave the medicine for my problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Overall good experience. The doctor advised very properly and was patiently explaining everything. Overall satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Nivedita is perfect and friendly natured person,she listen our problem carefully and then she will explain what has to be done to get rid of the problem.No unnecessary medications and test are suggested by her.if your in hand of doctor Nivedita then your in safest hand and just listen to her words for best results I regret that last movement I changed a doctor due to personal reasons and had c-section highly recommended doctor. visiting doctor Nivedita is value for everything

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today I am a proud mother of my son because of Dr Nivedita's guidance and treatment. last year she did treatment for infertility and after which I got pregnant within a month and bcz of her positive guidance and treatment this Jan I became a mother without any complications. She understands and listens all the problems patiently so a big thank you to Dr Nivedita.

review: Very friendly and polite dr, who can explain each and everything neatly to patient without rushing.

review: **** ****** * **** **** **** *** Highly professional,polite and understanding. I am really satisfied with the treatment provided.  She clarified all my doubts very patiently. I would highly recommend her for any gynae problems.
She is an good listener of our exact problem then she start her checkup accordingly with good suggestions which feel us that we have got relief from our health...
